title: [Animated orchestral cartoon by Walter Lantz]
brief_description: An animated musical which captures the festive antics of a group of farmyard animals playing a musical symphony using farm objects as instruments. The music gradually builds to a frenzied peak as birds and animals interfere with the conductor’s baton.
